Date of Birth: March 17, 1975. Several popular names: Power Star, Appu, Lohith Youngest son of the famous Kannada movie actor and the legend, late Dr. Raj Kumar. Is an actor, Singer, TV serial host Host for popular Kannada serial: Dhee(Etv) and Kannadada Kotyadhipathi( Suvarna) Acted as a child artist in 14 movies. For the movie Bettada Hoovu, he received National Film Award for Best Child Artist. Spouse name: Ashwini Revanath Hit movies: Almost all movies. But outstanding are Arasu, Milana, Jackie, Prithvi, Appu, Ram, Hudugaru, Paramathma, Vamshi, Aakash, Arasu, Bindaas. Awards received: Karnataka State Best Actor- twice, Filmfare Award for Best Actor – twice and SIIMA awards for Best Actor - once. RAGHAVENDRA RAJKUMAR, 18th cross, Sadashivanagar, Bangalore-560080.
